abstract: New wall text accompanying the Metropolitan Museum of Art's popular "The Steins Collect" exhibition - more than 200 works that demonstrate the influence of Gertrude Stein, her brothers Leo and Michael and her sister-in-law Sarah as 20th century art patrons - will acknowledge Gertrude's affiliation with a Vichy collaborator and Nazi agent.

headline.main: Met Museum Will Amend Wall Text to Reflect Gertrude Stein's Vichy Ties
headline.print_headline: Steins Exhibition at Met to Note Vichy Ties
